sys_remote_update_set.description:
The following script generates avatars for user records. Say goodbye to boring Initials!
x_snc_avatars.Avatar().get(sys_id, sprite); x_snc_avatars.Avatar().getRandom(sys_id); sys_id = sys_user.sys_id (Required) sprite = force a specific sprite to be returned (Optional)
Avatars are provided via API at https://avatars.dicebear.com/ ServiceNow Integration created by Earl Duque
sys_remote_update_set.name: Avatars

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_user</collection><condition>gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.generate_on_insert');</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Generate Avatar on Insert</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var method = gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.generate_on_insert.seed_or_random');
	if (method == 'random') var get_random_avatar = new x_snc_avatars.Avatar().getRandom(current.sys_id);
	else var get_avatar = new x_snc_avatars.Avatar().get(current.sys_id);
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-eduque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-31 16:57:56</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5fbcb37c4f35f3003d60b1d18110c7e6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Avatar on Insert</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Avatars" source="x_snc_avatars">2ba36b784ff1f3003d60b1d18110c7d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Avatars">2ba36b784ff1f3003d60b1d18110c7d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5fbcb37c4f35f3003d60b1d18110c7e6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-eduque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-31 17:08:28</sys_updated_on><template/><when>async</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5fbcb37c4f35f3003d60b1d18110c7e6"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysauto_script_5e310c414f75f3003d60b1d18110c705
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><name>Generate Avatars</name><run_as display_value="Earl Duque">10b0d0d34f597b004b00cfa18110c71f</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period/><run_start>2019-05-31 17:16:27</run_start><run_time>1970-01-01 08:00:00</run_time><run_type>on_demand</run_type><script><![CDATA[//For all? Even if they already have an avatar
var all_users = false;
//By Sys_id (Seed) or Completely Random?
var method = 'sys_id';

var generate_avatars_gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
generate_avatars_gr.orderBy('user_name');
generate_avatars_gr.query();
while(generate_avatars_gr.next()){
	if (generate_avatars_gr.getDisplayValue('photo')){
		if (all_users) generateAvatar(generate_avatars_gr.getUniqueValue());
		else continue;
	} else generateAvatar(generate_avatars_gr.getUniqueValue());
}

function generateAvatar(sys_id){
	if (method == 'random') var get_random_avatar = new x_snc_avatars.Avatar().getRandom(sys_id);
	else var get_avatar = new x_snc_avatars.Avatar().get(sys_id);
	gs.info('Avatar generated for ' + sys_id);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-eduque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-31 17:25:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>5e310c414f75f3003d60b1d18110c705</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generate Avatars</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Avatars" source="x_snc_avatars">2ba36b784ff1f3003d60b1d18110c7d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Avatars">2ba36b784ff1f3003d60b1d18110c7d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_5e310c414f75f3003d60b1d18110c705</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-eduque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-31 17:28:15</sys_updated_on><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_fbc3a3b84ff1f3003d60b1d18110c73b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_snc_avatars.Avatar</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>The following script generates avatars for user records. Say goodbye to boring Initials!
x_snc_avatars.Avatar().get(sys_id, sprite);
x_snc_avatars.Avatar().getRandom(sys_id);
sys_id = sys_user.sys_id (Required)
sprite = force a specific sprite to be returned (Optional)

Avatars are provided via API at https://avatars.dicebear.com/
ServiceNow Integration created by Earl Duque</description><name>Avatar</name><script><![CDATA[// The following script generates avatars for user records. Say goodbye to boring Initials!
// x_snc_avatars.Avatar().get(sys_id, sprite);
// x_snc_avatars.Avatar().getRandom(sys_id);
// sys_id = sys_user.sys_id (Required)
// sprite = force a specific sprite to be returned (Optional)

// Avatars are provided via API at https://avatars.dicebear.com/
// ServiceNow Integration created by Earl Duque

var Avatar = Class.create();
Avatar.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	get: function(sys_id, sprite) {
		
		var valid_sprites = ['male','female','identicon','bottts','avataaars','jdenticon','gridy'];
		var instance_sprites = gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.sprites.valid').split(',');
		var default_sprite = gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.sprites.default');
		var use_gender = gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.sprites.use_gender');
		
		if (!sys_id) return 'Missing sys_id';
		
		if (sprite && instance_sprites.indexOf(sprite) == -1) sprite = default_sprite;
		else if (!sprite) {
			var user_gender_gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
			if(user_gender_gr.get(sys_id)){
				var gender = user_gender_gr.getValue('gender');
				if (use_gender && gender == 'Male' || gender == 'Female') sprite = gender.toLowerCase();
				else sprite = default_sprite;
			} else return 'Unknown user sys_id';
		}
		
		// Find old attachments and remove them
		var gsa = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var old_photo_to_delete_gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		old_photo_to_delete_gr.addEncodedQuery('table_name=sys_user^ORtable_name=ZZ_YYsys_user^file_name=photo');
		old_photo_to_delete_gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', sys_id);
		old_photo_to_delete_gr.query();
		while(old_photo_to_delete_gr.next()) {
			gsa.deleteAttachment(old_photo_to_delete_gr.sys_id);
		}

		var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
		rm.setLogLevel('All');
		rm.setEndpoint('https://avatars.dicebear.com/v2/' + sprite + '/' + sys_id + '.svg');
		rm.saveResponseBodyAsAttachment('sys_user',sys_id,'photo');
		var response = rm.execute();

		var photo_sys_id = response.getResponseAttachmentSysid();
		gsa.copy('sys_user', sys_id, 'ZZ_YYsys_user', sys_id);
		gsa.deleteAttachment(photo_sys_id);

		return 'Response Code: ' + response.getStatusCode();
	},
	
	getRandom: function(sys_id) {
		
		var valid_sprites = ['male','female','identicon','bottts','avataaars','jdenticon','gridy'];
		var instance_sprites = gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.sprites.valid').split(',');
		var default_sprite = gs.getProperty('x_snc_avatars.avatars.sprites.default');
		var random_sprite = Math.floor(Math.random() * Math.floor(instance_sprites.length));
		
		if (!sys_id) return 'Missing sys_id';
		
		// Find old attachments and remove them
		var gsa = new GlideSysAttachment();
		var old_photo_to_delete_gr = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
		old_photo_to_delete_gr.addEncodedQuery('table_name=sys_user^ORtable_name=ZZ_YYsys_user^file_name=photo');
		old_photo_to_delete_gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', sys_id);
		old_photo_to_delete_gr.query();
		while(old_photo_to_delete_gr.next()) {
			gsa.deleteAttachment(old_photo_to_delete_gr.sys_id);
		}

		var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
		rm.setHttpMethod('GET');
		rm.setLogLevel('All');
		rm.setEndpoint('https://avatars.dicebear.com/v2/' + instance_sprites[random_sprite] + '/' + Math.random().toString(36).slice(2) + '.svg');
		rm.saveResponseBodyAsAttachment('sys_user',sys_id,'photo');
		var response = rm.execute();

		var photo_sys_id = response.getResponseAttachmentSysid();
		gsa.copy('sys_user', sys_id, 'ZZ_YYsys_user', sys_id);
		gsa.deleteAttachment(photo_sys_id);

		return 'Response Code: ' + response.getStatusCode();
	},

	type: 'Avatar'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin-eduque</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-05-31 15:08:44</sys_created_on><sys_id>fbc3a3b84ff1f3003d60b1d18110c73b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Avatar</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Avatars" source="x_snc_avatars">2ba36b784ff1f3003d60b1d18110c7d9</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Avatars">2ba36b784ff1f3003d60b1d18110c7d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fbc3a3b84ff1f3003d60b1d18110c73b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin-eduque</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-05-31 17:33:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
